name: Your Name
intro: I am a developer passionate about creating modern and responsive web applications. I have experience in stock management systems development and digital transformations within a drone company.
experience_description: I have worked on various projects, notably in stock management, where I improved processes using modern technologies. My internship at the drone company allowed me to gain hands-on experience and enhance my skills in information systems development.
skill1: Front-end development with React and Vite.js
skill3: Continuous integration and deployment with modern tools
blog_overview_description: This blog is a space where I share my professional experiences, technical challenges, and learnings from my projects, including during my internship at a drone company.
